# binary-e***REMOVED***tensions

> List of binary file e***REMOVED***tensions

The list is just a [JSON file](binary-e***REMOVED***tensions.json) and can be used anywhere.

```sh

console.log(binaryE***REMOVED***tensions);
//=> ['3ds', '3g2', â€¦]
```
